text.div:
Release Date: 2018-08-12

Level Code Display Definition
1 (_QueryRequestLimit) Abstract   Definition: The number of matching instances (number of focal classes). The document header class is the focal class of a document, a record would therefore be equal to a document.
2   RD record Definition: The number of matching instances (number of focal classes). The document header class is the focal class of a document, a record would therefore be equal to a document.

name: v3.QueryRequestLimit
title: v3 Code System QueryRequestLimit
description:
Definition:
Defines the units associated with the magnitude of the maximum size limit of a query response that can be accepted by the requesting application.

property.description: Indicates that the code is abstract - only intended to be used as a selector for other concepts

concept.definition: Definition: The number of matching instances (number of focal classes). The document header class is the focal class of a document, a record would therefore be equal to a document.
